item_44_5.agenda: To consider various construction activities already approved by the Chairman, BWC, for ratification by the BWC against agenda item No. 42.6

activities.work: Construction of cross drain and up gradation of drain of Aryabhatta Hostel at NIT Agartala
activities.bwc_decision: The BWC noted the work completion report

activities.work: Supply & fitting fixing of L&T make spare parts for the existing LT Air Circuit Breakers installed near Old Academic Building, Dhalai Hostel & Auditorium including service & maintenance in NIT Agartala
activities.bwc_decision: The BWC noted the work completion report
